QuestData.Title: Beatface vs. Boulder
QuestData.Description: After the saberon stole from these plants, they were forced further up Steamscar Rise and barricaded themselves in. I could not find a way to get in but you have the solution.$b$bOne path is blocked by a boulder, but it looks weak. A strong warrior, such as an ogre, could break it.$b$bI think you know an ogre gladiator...
QuestData.LogDescription: Break the boulder barrier using Beatface the gladiator.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, but we need to move quickly before the plants realize the way is open...
